'''''Land of Fair Springs''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Mortal Travails: Series IV]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to resonate with {{Hydro}} at a [[Statue of The Seven]] in [[Fontaine]] for the first time.
